mapper.insert: insert into ec_first_act (cust_no, bank_cd, bank_ac, wht_def_ac, bank_ac_nam, prov_cd, city_cd, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat ) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whtDefAc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAcNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select cust_no, bank_cd, bank_ac, wht_def_ac, bank_ac_nam, prov_cd, city_cd, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_first_act

select cust_no, bank_cd, bank_ac, wht_def_ac, bank_ac_nam, prov_cd, city_cd, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_first_act where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rec_stat = '0'
